categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Gisseran was a Moff of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Gisseran acquired a memento from the invasion of Taris, but he was forced to seek outside help when he discovered the memento stolen.
At a later update of the game Star Wars: The Old Republic, the crew-mission description was changed and featured him as Colonel instead of Moff.
